Posts.Content: Lori-ann wrote: Hi Ladies. I am getting very frustrated with getting prior authorization for BRCA testing.  My breast surgeon's office can't find the code for the test.  I have called my primary doc's office and also Tricare and no one knows anything.  The lady I talked at Tricare had no idea what I was talking about and kept telling me that my doctor should have that information. So if anyone has had the test recently can you please let me know if there was a code on your Tricare statement or if you called a certain number for authorization. Thanks so much! Lori-ann  Dx 11/15/2011, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 0/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Surgery 1/21/2012 Mastectomy: Left, Right Surgery 1/21/2012 Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Surgery 2/10/2012 Reconstruction (right): Latissimus dorsi flap Surgery 2/22/2012 Reconstruction (left): Latissimus dorsi flap Chemotherapy 4/5/2012 Adriamycin (doxorubicin), Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Hormonal Therapy 8/1/2012 Tamoxifen pills (Nolvadex, Apo-Tamox, Tamofen, Tamone) Targeted Therapy 8/16/2012 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Surgery 8/27/2012 Reconstruction (left); Reconstruction (right) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Military Spouces Help with BRCA Test Code for Tricare Lori-ann Tammy2012
